prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CulinaryWorld
Title: The Unexplored Delicacies of Antarctic Cuisine: An Adventurous Journey
Description: Dive into the unique and exotic world of Antarctic culinary delights. Discover unexplored recipes from the icy continent, their historical significance, and the challenges in preparing them in harsh conditions.
Yes I am interested in following the article to learn more about this subject.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumMechanicsDigest 
Title: Understanding the Quantum Entanglement: A Leap into the Quantum Realm 
Description: Delve into the mind-blowing concepts of quantum entanglement and its implications for our understanding of reality. This article breaks down the complex world of quantum mechanics into digestible parts, offering insight into its potential applications and the future of quantum computing.
Yes I am interested in following the Quantum Mechanics Digest article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SocialAnthropologyToday 
Title: The Impact of Social Media on Tribal Cultures: An In-depth Study 
Description: Explore how the advent of social media influences the dynamics of various tribal cultures. Analyze the effects of digital connectivity on traditional practices, inter-tribal communication, and the contemporary issues faced by these communities in adapting to the modern world.
It does sound very appealing to learn about this subject so yes!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceFrontierNews
Title: The Future of Interplanetary Travel: Human Settlement on Mars by 2050
Description: Explore the possibilities of life on Mars as we delve into the cutting-edge technologies that might make a human settlement on the Red Planet possible in the next few decades. This article examines the benefits, challenges, and implications of interplanetary travel, from terraforming and survival on Mars to the socio-political aspects of space colonization.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtInMotion
Title: The Evolution and Impact of Digital Art: From Pixel Art to Virtual Reality
Description: This article traces the journey of digital art from its humble beginnings to the immersive technologies of today. It aims to throw light on how digital art has reshaped the global art scene, its influence on various industries, and the potential future of this dynamic medium.
I would like to learn more about this subject, absolutely.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EcoWarriorInsights
Title: The Paradox of Sustainability and Consumerism: Can They Coexist?
Description: This article explores the dichotomy between the principles of sustainability and the demands of consumerism. It discusses the environmental implications of our consumer habits, the role of businesses in promoting sustainable consumption, and the potential strategies to reconcile these seemingly contradictory ideologies.
This is something that I absolutely take interest in, both to learn and to understand better, so yes.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
